text: 'Cangjie programming language_package_package_module': 'In Cangjie code language, A module in Cangjie is a collection of several packages and is the smallest unit of distribution for third-party developers. The entry point of a module's program must be in its root directory, and there can be at most one top-level main function as the entry point. The main function either has no parameters or takes an Array<String> as a parameter and returns an integer or Unit.'
